title: Onsite playground, Private balcony or patio, 9-foot ceilings
posting_body: Village at Desert Lakes provides its residents with a wide selection of unique one, two and three bedroom apartment homes that feature exclusive community and household amenities like custom cabinetry, vaulted ceilings, and in-home washer and dryers.

-Fully equipped kitchen with custom cabinetry                                                                                                                                                                                                                    Featured amenity
-Virtual Moving Concierge: Complimentary address change, set up home services and digital moving announcements
-Hub by Amazon: package lockers with 24/7 access to packages                                                                                         Featured amenity
For more information, visit us at: <URL>
